WorkItem.Description:
Inner text on below HTML should be "test test test test 123 567" but its showing as "test test test test 123 567false,false,1" any idea how to take care of this issue? Is it a bug in the library? Â 
test test test test 123 567
false,false,1

Comments.Message:
I tested the above element in a handful of browsers and found the following:
 * IE9: text includes "false,false,1"
 * Firefox 16: text is undefined (innerText not supported)
 * Chrome 23: text does NOT include "false,false,1".

Given that innerText started out as an IE-specific feature, and that the HAP seems to emulate IE in most regards, I would probably guess that this behavior is intentional.

Attached file should demonstrate the difference if run in various modern browsers (NOTE: I did not test it in IE < 9, so it may fail there, but AFAIK it should work.)
